examples.example: 我很喜欢用牛油果制作各种美味又健康的料理。

translate.english: I really like to use avocados to make all kinds of delicious and healthy dishes.

examples.example: 我今天用牛油果做了一个精美的沙拉，味道十分不错。

translate.english: I made a beautiful salad with avocado today and it tastes very good.

examples.example: 我每天早上都吃用牛油果做的三明治，感觉充满了活力。

translate.english: I eat sandwiches made with avocados every morning and feel full of energy.
